PreyCaptureEvaluator

Evaluator for the prey capture task.

Functions
PreyCaptureEvaluator
public PreyCaptureEvaluator(
int preyInitMoves,
float preySpeed,
float sensorRange,
int maxTimesteps,
int trialsPerEvaluation
)

Construct with the provided task and evaluator parameters.

Parameters
preyInitMoves
int

Prey initial moves. The number of moves the prey is allowed to move before the agent can move.

preySpeed
float

Prey speed; in the interval [0, 1].

sensorRange
float

The sensor range of the agent.

maxTimesteps
int

The maximum number of simulation timesteps to run without the agent capturing the prey.

trialsPerEvaluation
int

The number of prey capture trials to run per evaluation.

public FitnessInfo Evaluate(
IBlackBox<double> box
)

Evaluate the provided black box against the prey capture task, and return its fitness score.

Parameter
box
IBlackBox<double>

The black box to evaluate.

A new instance of FitnessInfo.
